sentences.sContent: There were thirty students present,reckoning without the girlstudents.
sentences.sContent_eng: There were thirty students present,reckoning without the girlstudents.
sentences.sCn: 不算女生，有三十个学生出席。

sentences.sContent: His words refreshed my memory that he remained a bachelor at the age of thirty.
sentences.sContent_eng: His words refreshed my memory that he remained a bachelor at the age of thirty.
sentences.sCn: 他的话使我回想起他三十岁时还是个光棍。

sentences.sContent: He counted to thirty for her in Spanish and then told her he could count to one million in English.
sentences.sContent_eng: He counted to thirty for her in Spanish and then told her he could count to one million in English.
sentences.sCn: 我儿子为她表演了用西班牙语查数，一直到三十，然后告诉她，他可以用英语一直查到一百万。

words.tran: 第三十个的；三十分之一的
